data.title: JANET KAY & CARROLL THOMPSON
meta_keywords: JANET KAY & CARROLL THOMPSON at Fox & Firkin
data.meta_description: JANET KAY & CARROLL THOMPSON Hosted By Fox and Firkin. Event starts on Sunday, 15 September 2024 and happening at Fox & Firkin, 316a, 316 Lewisham High St, Lewisham, London SE136JZ, London, EN. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
data.text:
About the event JANET KAY & CARROLL THOMPSON

The Queens of Lovers Rock return to Fox and Firkin on the 15th of September. Janet Kay and Carroll Thompson bring an unforgettable night of Lovers Rock and Romantic Reggae!

Janet Kay is best known for her iconic Dennis Bovell-produced single "Silly Games," which topped the UK charts in 1979. Beyond her chart-topping success, Janet has enchanted audiences with underground hits like "Loving You," "That's What Friends Are For," and "I Do Love You." Her illustrious career includes collaborations with music giants such as Fatboy Slim, Jackie Mittoo, Aswad, and Sly & Robbie.

Sharing the spotlight is the incomparable Carroll Thompson, who first captured hearts with her reggae smash "I'm So Sorry." Carroll's captivating voice brought us timeless classics like "Hopelessly In Love," "Make It With You," "Love Won't Let Us Wait," and "I'm Still Waiting." As the lead vocalist and founding member of the 1980s Jazz-Funk group Floy Joy, Carroll has also worked alongside legends such as Sugar Minott, Trevor Walters, Courtney Pine, Chaka Khan, Stevie Wonder, Michael Jackson, Natalie Cole, Maxi Priest, and Billy Ocean.

--------------------
